TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CacheEntryUpdateArguments extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关将从缓存中移除的缓存项的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a cache entry that will be removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的参数 包含有关缓存实现将要移除的项的详细信息。The arguments in the class contain details about an entry that the cache implementation is about to remove. 自变量包含缓存项的键、对要从中 删除项的实例的引用、删除的原因以及包含该项的缓存中的区域名称。The arguments include a key to the cache entry, a reference to the instance that the entry will be removed from, a reason for the removal, and the region name in the cache that contains the entry. 类的构造函数 使用这些参数创建类的新实例。The constructor of the class uses these arguments to create a new instance of the class. 对象被传递给 处理程序，该处理程序通知缓存要删除的项。A object is passed to a handler, which notifies the cache about the entry to remove.

para.span: 回调处理程序必须通知缓存实现是否向缓存中插入替换项，以替代将要移除的缓存项。

span.span: A callback handler must notify the cache implementation whether to insert a replacement entry into the cache in place of the cache entry that is about to be removed.

para.span: 如果要交换缓存条目，则必须为属性分配一个以外的值 。

span.span: If you want to exchange cache entries, you must assign a value other than to the property.

para.span: 缓存实现会将 属性的值解释 为注意，应删除当前缓存项，但不应将其替换。

span.span: Cache implementations will interpret a value for the property as a notice that the current cache entry should be removed but not replaced.

param.name: source
param.span: 将从中移除由 引用的缓存项的 实例。

span.span: The instance from which the cache entry referenced by will be removed.

param.name: reason
param.span: 用于指示要移除该缓存项的原因的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicate why the cache entry will be removed.

param.name: key
param.span: 将要移除的缓存项的键。

span.span: The key of the cache entry that will be removed.

param.name: regionName
param.span: 要从中移除该缓存项的缓存区域的名称。

span.span: The name of the region in the cache to remove the cache entry from.
This parameter is optional.

param.span: 如果未定义缓存区域，则 必须为 。

span.span: If cache regions are not defined, must be .

summary.span: 获取或设置用于更新缓存对象的 项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of entry that is used to update the cache object.

value.span: 要在缓存对象中更新的缓存项。

span.span: The cache entry to update in the cache object.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要交换要为更新的缓存项移除的缓存项，则必须将 对象分配给 属性，并将对象分配给 属性。If you want to exchange a cache entry that is about to be removed for an updated cache entry, you must assign a object to the property and assign a object to the property. 该值必须是以外的值 `null` 。The value must be a value other than `null`. 缓存实现会将 `null` 属性的值解释 为注意，应删除当前缓存项，但不应将其替换。Cache implementations will interpret a `null` value for the property as a notice that the current cache entry should be removed but not replaced.

summary.span: 获取或设置已更新的 项的缓存逐出或过期策略。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache eviction or expiration policy of the entry that is updated.

value.span: 已更新的缓存项的缓存逐出或过期策略。

span.span: The cache eviction or expiration policy of the cache item that was updated.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要使用更新的缓存条目替换将要移除的缓存项，则可以选择将 对象分配给 属性。If you want to replace a cache entry that is about to be removed with an updated cache entry, you can optionally assign a object to the property. 对象可用于为 更新的缓存条目指定缓存策略 (如过期详细信息) 。The object enables you to specify cache policy (such as expiration details) for the updated cache entry. 若要详细了解如何使用更新的缓存条目来替换已删除的缓存条目，请参阅 " 类概述" 和 " 属性"。For more information about how to replace a removed cache entry by using an updated one, see the class overview and the property.
